channel.title: Main Menu Editing
channel.description:
How Do i edit the main menu the menu thing that comes up when you first login could anyone post a tut or point me to it...
~K Y L E F T W
It will be most appreciated ;D

item.title: Main Menu Editing
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

if you ever need to edit anything, remember just hit ctrl + f. type in what you want to change (in this example you would type in “wecome to” and keep clicking next untill you find it.

Read full topic

item.title: Main Menu Editing
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

Procedure
Step 1:
ok first you want to add the void search up

public void updatePlayers()

Step 2:
Ok add this

	public void CommandMenu()
	{

					sendQuest("@dre@TITLEHERE", 8144);  //Title
					clearQuestInterface();
					sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGEHERE", 8145);
					sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGEHERE", 8147);
					sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGEHERE", 8148);
					sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGEHERE", 8149);
					sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGEHERE", 8150);
					sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGEHERE", 8151);
                                                                sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGEHERE", 8152);
					sendQuest("@dbl@::MESSAGEHERE", 8153);
					sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGEHERE8154);
					sendQuest("@dbl@MESSAGEHERE", 8156);
				       	sendQuestSomething(8143);
					showInterface(8134);
					flushOutStream();
		
				}

Step 3:
Ok once you have that you need to add it to a command so
Search for

end of frame

Scroll down untill you see something like this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("slayermenu"))
	{
		
		SlayerHelpMenu();	
	}

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("theifmenu"))
	{
		
		TheifHelpMenu();	
	}

        else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("castlewars"))
	{
		
		CastlewarsHelpMenu();	
	}


	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("servermenu"))
	{
		
		ServerHelpMenu();	
	}
	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Commands"))
	{
		
		CommandMenu();	
	}

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("smeltingmenu"))
	{
		
		SmeltingHelpMenu();	
	}

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fishingmenu"))
	{
		
		FishingHelpMenu();	
	}

Step 5:
Now just add this anywhere

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands"))
	{
		
		CommandMenu();	
	}

No credit to me…

Read full topic
